content: Per the title, I think #tutorials should probably be updated (or killed altogether I guess...). It currently points to a Lean3 repo, nowadays it should presumably point to something like GlimpseOfLean or just the learning resources page?
Yikes! Well spotted! It's currently pointing to https://github.com/leanprover-community/tutorials .
I've updated to point to the learning resources page: #tutorials
Luigi Massacci has marked this topic as resolved.
